snippet.title: Star Wars Pinball: Rogue One Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Infiltrate the Empire, steal the plans for the Death Star, and restore hope to a hopeless galaxy in Star Wars Pinball: Rogue One, based on the blockbuster film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story!

The Star Wars Pinball: Rogue One table features 10 story-related game modes, each one with its own set of playfield toys and goals. You must avoid stormtrooper detection in stealth missions, hold your own in firefights and combat missions, evade the footsteps of an AT-ACT walker, navigate the U-wing to shoot down TIE strikers as the ship’s gunner, and face off against Director Krennic and his Death Troopers in a white-knuckle multiball mode. 

Rebellions are built on hope – and the only hope the galaxy has lies at the feet of a rogue band of rebel fighters that is prepared for a daring mission. Welcome to Rogue One! 

Download it today!

Xbox 360: http://marketplace.xbox.com/en-US/Product/Star-Wars-Pinball-Rogue-One/40f99333-87a2-4510-b601-be01be126bbb (purchase on Xbox 360 first, then import to Xbox One to enjoy on both systems!)

Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/star-wars-pinball-rogue-one/brvgp2m7550t

Windows 10: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/pinball-fx2-windows-10-edition/9nblggh2kdp0

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/585540/

PSN North America: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-us/search/f=%5Estar%2Bwars%2Bpinball%2Brogue%2Bone%7Cbucket~games?smcid=ps:show-now:visit-playstation-store:ps-playstation-store 

PSN Europe: https://store.playstation.com/#!/en-gb/search/q=star%20wars%20pinball%20rogue%20one

Mac: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/zen-pinball-2/id527953383?mt=12
